ceremony.name: Ceremony & Reception
ceremony.watchWebsite: For more information watch the website.

rsvp.name: R.S.V.P.
rsvp.fillForm: Please fill out the form bellow.

submittedMessage.success: Successfully submit the invitation. If the groom of the bride said you can invite +1 person, fill in the invitation once again for the +1.
submittedMessage.validation-error: It seems that the email has been used. Use a different email and fill in the invitation again.
submittedMessage.error: Fatal error. It looks like something doesn't work. Try to fill in the invitation again later.
submittedMessage.warning: Ouch! It looks like you forgot to fill something. Fill all the necessary columns and submit the invitation again.
